SEARCH

app API

Server documentation (Android documentation here)

Documentation for Android app. It works as a bluetooth/LAN client and as a video player.

Used technologies

Android Studio Flamingo with Gradle 8.0.

Most important classes

  • MainActivity - entry point of the application.
  • BluetoothClient - connects to a bluetooth server and creates a socket. The communication is in FragmentBluetooth and FragmentOnlineCamera.
  • LanClient - connects to a LAN server and creates a socket. The communication is in FragmentBluetooth and FragmentOnlineCamera.
  • ColorConfig - handles the color configuration of the heatmap. Creates color from number value, creates empty screen woth message, creates bitmap of the heatmap.
  • JsonParser - Parse JSON files with frame data from the server and returns it as a map.
  • FileHelper - for file operations - like copy file into internal storage, list files, get directory...
  • SendReceive - reads the config file and sends it to the server. Also receives the JSON files (frames data) and saves them into internal storage.

Fragmets

  • FragmentBluetooth - Fragment for the Bluetooth and LAN connection. Connects to the server.
  • FragmentOfflinePlayer - Used for playing offline records. List and load files.
  • FragmentOnlineCamera - Used for streaming and reording the frames from the server. Sends the config file, receives frame data.
  • FragmentSettings - Fragment for the settings page - saves the config file.
